items.sentence: I think each of us should give Tom something for his birthday, something home-made!
Tom didn't realize that Mary didn't have enough money to buy food for her children.
Because I don't have children, I can spend more time volunteering than parents can.
It snowed last night and I don't have snow tires, so I walked to work this morning.
I told you it was dangerous. The reason you got hurt was because you didn't listen.
